content.rendered:
Last week the Luxe Team took part in colouring education with Victoria Hunter, the co-owner of one of New York’s hottest salons, Whitmore House.

Teaching the techniques of Balayage, Ombre and hair-painting, Victoria and her team demonstrated new ways of creating beautiful colours with the stylists.

If you would like to try out a new colour leading into the warmer months, speak to your stylist about how they could incorporate these new techniques at your upcoming appointment.

Visit Whittemore House Salon to learn more about Victoria and her salon.
